name: Intro
commands: Whew... A town.|One not on the border too... A place to catch some rest, finally!
Ok, time to get some rooms...
Is that what we're calling it, mhm?|Just admit you're bad at the game!
No WAY! These cards... They're rigged!|Or something...|Hah... Hahahaha!|Of course! You're right, my good fellow, I thought we were playing Go Fish!
Wh-Whahahaha!|You're an interesting one! But time for me to turn in for the night.|Maybe we'll meet again and I'll fleece you for more of your money!
Ah, have a good one, sir!
Woah! Sal! That's crazy!|Crazy... wait, why are you here?
We had to attend the Aurelian coronation in place of your father, due to his health...
Well, the old man is kicking, right?
Yes, but with the prince being assassinated and fingers pointed at Arcein...|Uh, who is your friend here?
Ah, forgive me mademoiselle. Maxime, but you can call me Max.|Look, I won't pry into your... complicated affairs.|Good night, my lady.
The assassin praised Lord Sages in his last breath...
Man, those guys are not too bright are they?|As if any hired blade couldn't lie...
Precisely. But in our escape we may have uh... made things... delicate.
Sounds tough...{c:wait;400} Oh well! Time to hit the hay and be off to a nicer place tomorrow!
You don't sound too bothered, but we must make haste home to your father and plan our actions.
Ugh, so stupid. The old man can handle it!
You're the prince, and your fathers heir no less! You have to take some responsibility!
Fine... Then I'll plan our course for tomorrow and we can part ways...|Now, sleep, your Highness.
Wahoo! See Sal, you get it!|See you on the flipside!
Hm, I hear shouting outside. Someone fetch his Highness in case...
They're persistent, it would be admirable if it weren't us they were after.
Buzz off already! This whole charade is foolish!
Well, well. The prince himself is here!|No doubt in kahoots with this plot.
Ugh... This is all so stupid!|I had no such involvement!
Likely story! Why else would the prince be hiding away here?
I'm steadfast by your side, your Highness.|They won't listen to reason, but they might listen to our might.
Ah, good show, Sal. You can handle this fine, hm?
But! Hmph, the audacity!|I implore you to help us, your Highness.
Ehhh... If I feel like it...|This is all such a moodkiller, y'know?|Also, don't take that tone with me, you're my subordinate after all...
So nonchalant! You will feel our fury, Arcein mutt!
I won't brook any insults to the prince!|Have at you!
So it's fine when she does it...
